title: Taxi Evasion
description: Marcelo brings the case against his girlfriend, Sam. When Sam takes off early from a night out, Marcelo would like her to take a cab home. Sam thinks he's not respecting her ability to walk home smartly and safely. Who's right? Who's wrong?
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
